import logo from "./logo.svg"; import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ FirstName: "", LastName: "", Gender: "", DOB: "", Email: "", Mobile: "", Location: "", }); const [total, setTotal] = useState([]); return (
{formData.FirstName} {formData.LastName} {formData.Gender}
); } export default App;
